text: Dimaadua ga hagaduadua Israel, gei Israel gaa bole be di aalek ma gaa duu i lodo di monowai mmidi. Mee ga daagi aga nia daangada Israel mai i di nadau henua humalia dela ne wanga gi nadau maadua mmaadua namua, gaa hai digaula gi meheuheu dagidahi, gii tugi loo i baahi i golo di Monowai Euphrates, idimaa digaula guu hai a Mee gi hagawelewele i di nadau hai nia ada di balu god ahina go Asherah.
